task_text: Which of my projects doesn't have somebody responsible for the quality assurance on the team?

text_blocks: Now I need to find projects where I am the Lead (my projects), and then check which ones don't have a QA role on the team.

project.name: Pre-treatment interface for e-coat line
project.description: Coating system tuned for CentraleAuto's pre-treatment stage feeding an existing e-coat line.

text_blocks:
I found that you have 1 project where you are the Lead. Let me check the team composition:

**Project: "Pre-treatment interface for e-coat line"** (proj_centraleauto_ecoat_interface)
- Team members and roles:
  - Bhwa_029 (you) - Lead - 0.3 FTE
  - Bhwa_048 - Engineer - 0.4 FTE
  - Bhwa_084 - Ops - 0.3 FTE
  - **Bhwa_125 - QA - 0.2 FTE** ← This person handles quality assurance

This project already has someone responsible for QA on the team.

input.message:
Your project "Pre-treatment interface for e-coat line" already has quality assurance coverage. Bhwa_125 is assigned as QA with 0.2 FTE allocation on the team.

You don't have any projects missing a QA role.

summary: ok_not_found: Your project "Pre-treatment interface for e-coat line" already has quality assurance coverage. Bhwa_
